management.name: Hukmi Chand Jain
desc: Hukmi Chand Jain has been the driving force behind the growth of Chetak Enterprises Limited for many years. With his knowledge of our markets and impeccable business acumen, he guides CEL towards becoming a top infrastructure enterprises.

management.name: Manohar Lal Anjana
desc: Manohar Lal Anjana started his career as an agriculturist, but soon moved to CEL. after spending close to two decades in building experience, he joined M/s. Chetak Enterprises as a working partner. After Chetak became a Private Limited Company, he has grown to become Director.

management.name: Neeraj Vijay
desc: Neeraj is a senior management leader who is one of the pioneers of PPP revolution in the country, and has been associated with it since 1990 when the first toll road of the country was built on PPP. In 2013, Neeraj stepped into entrepreneurship with M/S Chetak Zambia Ltd, India’s first business venture in Zambia and is currently leading the Company in the capacity Director of the firm.

management.name: Udai Lal Anjana
desc: Chetak Enterprises Limited was promoted by Udai Lal Anjana, who started a partnership firm with ML Anjana, and PM Anjana in 1990, and later successfully transitioned to Chetak Enterprises Limited. He is also serving the society by his active participation in politics. He has served as Member of Parliament from Chittorgarh district and has been elected as MLA from Nimbahera.

management.name: Puran Mal Anjana
desc: Puran Mal started his career in 1990, when he joined M/s Chetak Enterprises with Manohar Lal Anjana, and Udai Lal Anjana. He currently serves as a Director in CEL.

management.name: Deepak Sharma
desc: Deepak Sharma joined M/s. CHetak Enterprises Ltd. as a director and has more than a decade experience in the fielf of construction.

management.name: Beena Anjana
desc: Ms. Beena is well-qualified and competent professional with more than a decade of experience in the field of Infrastructure. She has started her career as entrepreneur in family business and has gained vast experience in Infrastructure sector. She is associated with Chetak Enterprises as woman Director since March, 2015. She is also Director in Chetak Tollways Limited a subsidiary of Chetak Enterprises Limited.

financials.desc: Chetak Balance sheet shows a steady growth of PAT from 2014 to 2016 as shown in above table. Even there is reduction in Net sales there is increase in Profit after Tax which states the reduction in financial cost, overhead and other expenses..

contact.registeredOffice: Registered Address: Petch Area, Opp. Dak Banglow, Circuit House Road, Nimbahera – 312601, Distt.. Chittorgarh (Rajasthan)

about.content1: Chetak Enterprises Ltd always has dreams to set the benchmarks since the day it was established. Because it always knows that our achievements are only as big as our dreams and treats every project as an opportunity to stand out. We not only aim to deliver the top tier services but customer satisfaction with highest transparency and business integrity.
about.title: About us
content2: For over 26 years of experience Chetak Enterprises executed the projects of Highways & Bridges in PPP mode without any cost overrun or time overrun. Specialisation attained by company qualified it to get associated with different Government Authorities as Class 1 Concessionaire / EPC Contractor.

Current turnover of the company is 700Cr. INR and with unceasing & cohesive efforts of board members, with the current capacity & machinery our mission is to spread outside India and venture into Infra business either thru Joint Venture or on partnership.
